question: Who clinched the 2019 men’s singles Malaysia Open badminton tournament?
explanation: Chinese badminton ace Lin Dan clinched the 2019 men’s singles Malaysia Open  at Axiata Arena in Kuala Lumpur on April 7.  After an electric performance , he beat countryman Chen Long  9-21, 21-7, 21-11.  The title is Lin\'s first win this year, and also his first major success since taking the Malaysia Open in 2017.
